Articles.Content: Nova I doubt you'll see this but I read that with the terrain generator we couldn't create Gas giants, So did you find a way around that.

Nova I doubt you'll see this but I read that with the terrain generator we couldn't create Gas giants, So did you find a way around that.

Read the entire thread plox, it's already been answered.

Question to Nova:

Will aerocapture be possible with the new planets?
Upon closer inspection, that last transmission pic looks suspiciously like a rover... the shape is pretty much spot-on for a squaroid rover. Pretty small, though.
I'm still betting on it being a simple orbiting satellite.
It's the space Kraken that was accidentally killed by Jeb on his way to low sun orbit.
What about engines powered by the sun? You could attach solar panels which slowly gives you "fuel" for solar-powered engines?

It's the space Kraken that was accidentally killed by Jeb on his way to low sun orbit.
Ã…Â½

Ion based engines, but they still need some propellant to push the craft.. they cant just use electricity..

It appears the purple planet has an atmospheric pressure of 10x that of Kerbin and 10% more gravity. A trip to the planet looks lika a one-way ticket with the current rocket parts. However, on the only presented pic of the purple planet, it seems a rocket is hanging underneath a balloon ... ! Maybe a balloon will be one of the newer parts ... ? Could come in handy when travelling in extremely dense atmospheres.
The rocket's hanging underneath parachutes, not balloons.

The rover!

That looks like a...SKYCRANE?!
This next update appears to have a huge amount of content, yet Harvester considers them all to be small updates. I have to wonder what exactly would be considered a "Large" update. Lol.
It's the one from Yogui's Rover .

It's the space Kraken that was accidentally killed by Jeb on his way to low sun orbit.

Can I sig that? 8)
I know but it does look like a skycrane...I'm not gonna download a mod just to look :/

What about engines powered by the sun? You could attach solar panels which slowly gives you "fuel" for solar-powered engines?

All conventional (Read: non-hyperpace/warp etc) engines need a propellant to expel in order to push a craft, the only way you could have thrust just from the sun with conventional technology is a solar sail.

I know but it does look like a skycrane...I'm not gonna download a mod just to look :/

It's a skycrane , it works like the Curiosity skycrane, except that the winch don't work yet.

What about engines powered by the sun? You could attach solar panels which slowly gives you "fuel" for solar-powered engines?

If Nova kills my plugin...
Do we know the name of the desert planet? I'm assuming the purple one is Eve and the green one is Meander. There weren't any more planets revealed yet, right?

Here is the retouched picture from awhile back, now, try to tell me that over on the left there isn't something tht looks like an eye and a set of jaws. The texture of the top area suggests a underwater picture being taken, and there is something that oddly resembles a space shuttle looking thing to the left. Also, Nova said only one idea has been close to guessing what it is.

Ding ding ding I believe we have a winner.
Without docking, alot of things will be alot harder, they should have added docking before any new planets.
Getting to new planets won't be hard. I already know how I'll do it.

This is what I see:

[spoiler=]

Wait a minute, Nova's administering a Rorschach test! He's an undercover psychologist!

Do we know the name of the desert planet? I'm assuming the purple one is Eve and the green one is Meander. There weren't any more planets revealed yet, right?

We don't know, someone suggested a name and Nova liked it. Although he said he wanted Des in it, but he could have changed his mind...
Ooo!! That's the secret Munolith that's gonna be in orbit around a planet, or at least I hope by your drawing
